title: 150 Years On, Arlington National Cemetery Honors Its First Burial
teaser: Arlington National Cemetery kicks off celebrations of its 150th anniversary by commemorating its first military burial on May 13, 1864. Members of the family of Army Pvt. William Christman will participate in a wreath laying ceremony and place a stone of remembrance from the family's original home.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
